game_description: You are embarking on the road to the netherworld where you will fight with all kinds of enemies. If you pass all levels, you will be reborn as a human being under the care of God. During each level, if you see a huge scallop, enter it, and you will then move on to the next level. If you can't find one, touch a giant conch and follow its hints on how to get past the current level. Press the "X" button to move. Press the right trigger to fire.
review_1: not a bad game as long as you have the space to trun around physically….REALLY wish it had the toggle option to turn…please add this…..not everyone can move freely
review_2: Understanding the story design of the game requires an understanding of eastern culture. The operational design needs to be improved.
review_3: May still be in development but to far back of development to even be released. May be great once finished , I would save your money and wait for future updates
